welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sunninghill, a charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom known for its beautiful parks, historic buildings, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to the needs of high-end travelers and VIPs.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport handles all commercial flights and houses various amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport is used for military operations and personnel.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport with limited speed and data usage.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lasham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights, providing a more luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport handles all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the busier of the two terminals, serving a wide range of international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the smaller of the two terminals, mainly serving low-cost and charter airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with options for upgraded, faster connections available for purchase.
